nodes.text: P-T48 was a protocol droid who worked as a merchant during Great Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. During the war it ran a stall within the Republic controlled Shipwright Auxiliary Spaceport on the planet Corellia. P-T48 had yellow sensors and gold plating.

P-T48 first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic which was released in 2011 by BioWare. In the game it serves as a Republic social items vendor on Corellia. Its location was also marked on a map in the accompanying Prima Games strategy guide.
